content:
Diagnosis:		Right breast apocrine carcinoma

Stage:		T3N3M0 (Stage IIIC)

Biomarkers:	AR positive, ER/PR negative, HER2 positive (3+)

Treatment:		12 Jan 2024 Right mastectomy and axillary clearance
			1 Feb - 15 Mar 2024 Adjuvant chemotherapy (6 cycles docetaxel/carboplatin/trastuzumab)
			20 Mar - 30 Apr 2024 Adjuvant radiotherapy completed

Current Status:	End of treatment review

[redacted name] has completed her planned adjuvant treatment for right breast cancer. She tolerated the chemotherapy well with only grade 1 fatigue and minimal neuropathy. Radiotherapy was completed with expected grade 1 skin reaction which has now resolved. Her surgical site has healed well with good shoulder mobility. Performance status remains 0.

She will continue single agent trastuzumab to complete 12 months of treatment. Next dose due in 2 weeks. Mammogram of the contralateral breast and CT scan arranged for 3 months' time as baseline post-treatment imaging. Will review in clinic with results.

primary_cancer.biomarker_status: AR positive, ER/PR negative, HER2 positive (3+)

patient_facts.value: Grade 1 fatigue and minimal neuropathy from chemotherapy
Well-healed surgical site with good shoulder mobility

status_updates.value: Stage IIIC right breast apocrine carcinoma. Completed planned surgery, chemotherapy and radiotherapy with good tolerance
Grade 1 skin reaction from radiotherapy, now resolved
To continue single agent trastuzumab to complete 12 months of treatment
Mammogram of contralateral breast and CT scan in 3 months for post-treatment baseline
Clinical review when imaging results available
